title: BLE scanning always on
content:
I noticed that BLE Scanning is always on on my device, even if BT or BT scanning are off. etc.. The culprit is ''GOOGLE_SERVICES" , which in fact are 2 Google apps or services :com.google.android.gms and com.google.android.gsf...
I experienced severe battery drain since a while, getting worse by each day, even in safe mode and nothing points out to a specific app in particular (FR did not change anything). 
Could this be a lead and how to stop it? Not sure if it uses a lot of battery power but still weird...
